nodes.text: The Chunker Bunker was a bunker located on the planet Talus during the Galactic Civil War. It was used as a base of operations for the Chunkers, a gang of scavenger pirates which operated out of the Twin World of Talus. The bunker was located just southwest of Lake Bondoma. Circa 1 ABY, a spacer visited the bunker, fought some Chunkers and collected a Darksting assassin riffle.

The Chunker Bunker was a location in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. The Chunker Bunker was added to the game with the update named "Publish 1", released on August 3, 2003.
